Entries.danceRejection: Oh... I'm sorry, Mr. @... but no thank you.$s^Oh... I'm sorry, Ms. @... but no thank you.$s
Entries.Mon8: You take great care of your animals, @.#$e#Trust me... I just know!
Entries.Mon10: You... You're single, aren't you, @?$4#$e#Just curious!$4
Entries.Tue10: Thanks for visiting, @!#$e#It's always nice to see you.$4
Entries.Wed10: Hi, @! Are you here to see Shane?#$e#...Oh, me?$4
Entries.Fri8: Happy Friday, @! Any plans for the weekend?
Entries.Fri10: I'll be at the saloon tonight if you want to come see me.$h
Entries.event_marnieBreakup1: I... I know. But I shouldn't have let myself get so close to y-- that person...$8
Entries.event_marnieBreakup2: ...Maybe a little.$4#$b#Still... no one deserves that.$s
Entries.event_marnieBreakup3: Um... it's... it's not important. Maybe I'll tell you later...$s
Entries.event_marnieMorning1: Oh, well it's nice to see you! Actually, it's strange you happened by...#$b#I was just thinking about how I wanted to speak to you.
Entries.event_marnieMorning2: Oh! Is that so?$4#$b#Well... actually, now that you're here, there's something I wanted to talk to you about.
Entries.event_marnieMorning3: Oh... could you spare just a moment? There's actually something I wanted to talk to you about.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis1: Oh... well, I'm sorry to hear that.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis2: Ah... so we've both experienced heartache from the same man, huh?#$b#I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. @. Really.$s^I'm sorry to hear that, Ms. @. Really.$s
Entries.event_loveLewis3: I-Is that so?$s#$b#Well... I'm glad to hear that.$a
Entries.event_loveLewis4: I'm not sure Mr. Lewis felt the same way...$s
Entries.divorced: Oh... Do you have some business here...?$s
